About Me

Talent is a myth...

BIO

I have recently graduated from Southern Cross University with a Bachelor of Information Technology majoring in software development. I am curious by nature and am not satisfied with things just working, I want to know how and why things work. I am obsessive and will use this to my advantage to learn as much as I can as fast as I can. I am still not sure what kind of programmer I want to be yet, but I can see that mobile devices and web based systems will be very important in the future. Currently I understand that I only have introductory level skills but will never stop learning and am willing to work long hours and any days of the week.
